text: Rahayu Supanggah (August 29, 1949 â€“ November 10, 2020) was an Indonesian composer. He was known mostly for his part in the international collaboration Realizing Rama and the music score composed for Robert Wilson's I La Galigo. His compositions for Opera Jawa won the Asian Film Award in 2007. He was born in Boyolali Regency, Indonesia. Supanggah died of an illness on November 10, 2020 in Surakarta, Indonesia at the age of 71.Komposer Rahayu Supanggah Meninggal Dunia ==References== ==Other websites== *Southbank Centre biography Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indonesian writers Category:20th-century composers Category:21st-century composers
title: Rahayu Supanggah
